system.title: What is the 611 Study System?
system.quote: "611Study" refers to "School starts at 6 AM, ends at 11 PM, sick in ICU." This has become a common phenomenon in Chinese middle schools.
system.consequence: at school, severely damaging their mental and physical health. This model is

Participate in the community to propose new topics and solutions
Get off school by 6 PM üïï ‚Äî this is the right we deserve

vision.title: Principles and Vision
vision.content: 611Study.ICU is a grassroots shout from students. We encourage people from different regions and fields to join the discussion. Our community advocates for

inspiration.title: Our Inspiration
inspiration.followup: for the inspiration and open-source project framework. We carry forward its spirit into student rights protection, striving for a proper growth environment for Chinese children.
inspiration.warning: but avoid blindly expanding translation versions.

cta.title: Join us to drive change together
cta.desc: By filling out surveys and participating in the community, we collectively fight for students' rightful rights.

metaDescription: 611Study refers to the schedule of starting school at 6 a.m. and finishing at 11 p.m., with the phrase "fall sick, end up in the ICU." This has become a widespread and often mandatory routine in many middle and high schools across China. Countless students suffer both physically and mentally under this system. Through this project, we aim to help Chinese students break free from this prison-like schedule and reclaim a healthy, happy childhood.

site.title: 611Study ICU
site.description: A modern Next.js application with i18n and theme support

form.title: Overtime School Registration Questionnaire
form.description: Please fill in the relevant information of the school completely to ensure that the registration information is accurate.
form.card: We attach great importance to your privacy and data security. All information you submit will be kept strictly confidential and will only be used for academic research and data analysis. It will never be disclosed to any third party. Thank you for your trust and support.

province.label: Province
province.description: Province where your school is located

schoolStartTime.label: School Start Time
schoolStartTime.description: For your regular school start time, click the clock button on the right for quick entry (AM = morning, PM = afternoon).

schoolEndTime.label: School End Time
schoolEndTime.description: Daily school time (including evening self-study), click the clock button on the right to quickly fill in (AM-morning/PM-afternoon)

monthlyHolidays.label: Monthly Holiday Days
monthlyHolidays.description: Number of holiday days per month

suicideCases.label: Student Suicide Cases in 2024
suicideCases.description: Cases of students under extreme pressure

studentComments.label: Student Comments
studentComments.description: Share your thoughts about mental health pressure at your school

form.error: Error submitting survey. Please try again.

display.title: Overtime School Registration Questionnaire
display.card: All content is contributed by users and published after manual review. If you find any errors in the information, please contact us to correct or delete it.

join.title: Join the $Li Community
join.content: We sincerely invite you to become a part of the $Li Community, a group dedicated to promoting democracy, freedom of speech, and press freedom in China. Join our Telegram group to connect with like-minded individuals, share ideas, and drive positive change together.

committee.title: Join the Preparatory Committee
committee.intro: Do you have innovative ideas or professional skills? We are forming a preparatory committee to guide the $Li Community toward becoming a DDAO (Democratic Decentralized Autonomous Organization).

roles.visionary: Visionaries with unique insights: Have ideas for DAOs or projects aligned with our values.
roles.tech: Technical Experts: Experience in front-end/back-end development; blockchain expertise, especially in Rust and the Solana ecosystem.
roles.design: Creative Designers: Skilled in UI/UX, graphic design, or other creative fields.
roles.rights: Advocates for Democracy and Human Rights: Experienced in promoting democracy, human rights, and free speech.

why.title: Why Join?
why.mission: Work alongside passionate and like-minded individuals.
why.freedom: Be part of a great mission advancing freedom, human rights, and democratic experimentation.
why.future: Play a key role in shaping the future vision of the $Li Community.

how.title: How to Apply
how.intro: You can reach out to us through the following ways:
how.telegram: Click to join our Telegram group

jiang.title: 611 Study ICU Project Lead - Jiang Bu
jiang.bio: Jiang Bu ‚Äî dissident, artist, situationist. Lives in Paris. Has made documentaries, curated film selections, driven taxis, and been taken to the police station.
